features: Please be aware that the Preview may be slightly different from the physical item in terms of color due to our lighting at our product photoshoot or your device’s display.

Send an amazing gift for your special one with winorax Personalized Baseball Dad Tumbler that anyone who has an interest in playing baseballs such as your dad, grandpa, uncle, brother or husband. This tumbler was designed in sunset style that would be a nice gift for your dad on Father's Day.
Our insulated tumblers with a lid can contain both hot and cold drinks such as water, tea, coffee or smoothie - favorite item for hot summer, cold winter, and long-way trips.

Safe material, Premium Quality: With the double-walled vacuum insulated, this tumbler keeps your drinks cold for many hours. Moreover, our tumblers come with BPA-free, convenient drink lid. Constructed of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, winorax tumblers are durable, unbreakable, sweatproof, and rust-resistant.
Care Instruction: Hand wash recommended. Please do not freeze or microwave. This tumbler is made with love, so please handle it with care.
description: A great way to show your love and appreciation to your beloved is with this personalized tumbler. One of the ideal gifts for special occasions like Mother's Day, Birthday, Wedding, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Retirement, or just because.

Available in 2 sizes: 20oz and 30oz, which fit in most cup holders. With 20oz or 30oz capacity, our insulated, stainless steel, double-wall tumbler was designed to keep your beverages hot or cold for many hours. Moreover, our tumblers come with BPA-free, convenient drink lid. Constructed of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, winorax tumblers are durable, unbreakable, sweatproof, and rust-resistant.
